translation: Kya tohyhi chuhna mʿlvm kh tuhndụ̄ prvrdgarn kyah mʿāmlh kvr hsụ̄ valyn sintụ̄? (tvhụ̄ zạniv kuyth qdrt vvl chuh tuhund prvrdgar)
Kyah tihund tdbyr yus kʿbh shryf kis lvurns th munhdim krns mtʿlq avs suh kvr na Allah tʿālyā hn be kar th ghlṭ.
Byyhi svuzin timn petth janvr fvjv fvjv.
Time janvr ạsụ̄ travan timn hsụ̄ valyn petth knhi phlụ̄ yim draṣl paynh āmt ạsụ̄ sykhi th myczi.
Ps krụ̄ tim Allah tʿālyā han czapnh āmut gash hy yʿny tbah v brbad.
